message:
With families trafficking children, community efforts are needed to protect our children. 

There are many great organizations, coalitions, and task forces that are working together. If you want to get involeved in your area let us know and we will help you find events. If we can't find something we can work together and plan something. 
info@erasechildtrafficking.org

data.description: A Charlotte man and his wife both appeared in federal court and entered a guilty plea Tuesday, admitting to forcing children into prostitution in Myrtle Beach.
data.title: Charlotte couple pleads guilty in child sex trafficking case
